result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel E. Schmitt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Daniel E. Schmitt is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Daniel E. Schmitt was found guilty of Issue of Worthless Checks(<=$2500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.24(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Secure permission of probation agent to have a checking account.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel E. Schmitt

defendant.name: Schmitt, Daniel E.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: on petition for early discharge from probation - granted

1:48 pm - DA calls case and states appearances and agreement reached.   Defendant Daniel E. Schmitt appeared.  Mark T. Fuhr appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court questions DE regarding right to atty.    DE enters plea of NO CONTEST to Ct 2.    Court questions DE regarding the plea.  DA explains elements of charge.  Court finds plea/waiver to be free, etc.  Court finds factual basis does exist.  Court accepts plea, finds DE guilty and orders entry of JOC on Ct 2 and on motion of state dismisses Ct 1.  DA certifies victims rights compliance.  Court imposes:

Sentence withheld-1 year probation 
Conditions of probation
$500 fine inclusive of $200 DNA surcharge
$56.25 SBDA
$24.00 witness fees
$470.13 restitution plus 10% surcharge of $47.01 for a total of $517.14
Secure permission of probation agent to have a checking account

Appeal rights given.
Preliminary hearing on August 13, 2014 at 01:45 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel E. Schmitt
Current: PO Box 42, 335 North River Road, Park Falls, WI 54552 United States  (Effective: 04-15-2014)
Prior: 335 North River Road, Park Falls, WI 54552

If not already completed DE must submit to booking at Sheriff's Dept prior to release.  Defendant shall give written notice prior to any change in address or telephone number to the Clerk of this Court and Defense Attorney.
